reindex.title: Build Search Index
reindex.msg1: Choose how to update the Search Index. Options:
reindex.msg2: Build: index for all data without recreating.
reindex.msg3: Delete + build: Current search index will be deleted and built from scratch. Note that there WON'T BE ANY SEARCH RESULTS until the build process finishes.

permissions.search:index:rebuild: Allows to delete search index and build it again.
permissions.search:index:access: Allows access to the Search Index menu.

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.title: Schedule indexing jobs
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.description: Enable or disable periodic search index builders

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.title: Indexing jobs cron expression
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.description: x minutes use '0/x * * * *', x hours use '0 */x * * *' you can set minutes also '15 */x * * *', x days '0 0 */x * *'

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.title: The maximum items count per indexing partition
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.description: High value may will cause slow performance
